bencoding
Class ResponseDecoder

java.lang.Object
  bencoding.ResponseDecoder

public class ResponseDecoder
extends java.lang.Object

A decoder to torrent response streams.

Author:
Ari Hayes

ResponseDecoder

public ResponseDecoder(java.io.InputStream is)
                throws java.io.IOException
Creates a ResponseDecoder object, and parses torrent response.

Parameters:
is - The input stream for the response
Throws:
java.io.IOException - on failure reading response stream
Method Detail

parseDictionary

boolean parseDictionary(int dictionary_id)
                  throws java.io.IOException
Called by constructor to help parse response.

Parameters:
dictionary_id - Indicates whether in root dictionary, etc.
Returns:
true if syntactically correct dictionary is parsed successfully, false on failure.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - on failure to read a byte

private boolean parsePeerList()
                       throws java.io.IOException
Parses a bencoded list of peers.

parseString

java.lang.String parseString(int first_digit)
                       throws java.io.IOException
Parses an ASCII string at current offset of the stream.

Parameters:
first_digit - The first digit of the string-length if it was already read from stream.
Returns:
The String on success, null on failure.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - on failure reading stream

parseInteger

java.lang.Integer parseInteger(char end_byte,
                               int first_digit)
                         throws java.io.IOException
Parses an integer at current offset of the stream.

Parameters:
end_byte - The byte signaling the end of the integer, either ':' or 'e'
first_digit - The first digit of the integer if it was already read from stream.
Returns:
The Integer object on success, null on failure.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - on failure reading stream

parseInteger

java.lang.Integer parseInteger()
                         throws java.io.IOException
Parses an integer at current offset of the stream.

Returns:
The Integer object on success, null on failure.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - on failure reading stream
